channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Azure AD Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Azure AD Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2119|2024-08-04T07:01:41.123Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20ad%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Azure AD Plugin 1.1.2 and earlier transmits configured credentials in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.
